sentences.en: We bought the dishwasher on credit.
sentences.cn: 我们赊购了一台洗碗机。

sentences.en: The dishwasher slots neatly between the cupboards.
sentences.cn: 洗碗机刚好可以放在两个碗橱之间。

sentences.en: Leona put some detergent into the dishwasher, shut the door, and pressed the switch.
sentences.cn: 利昂娜在洗碗机里放了些清洁剂，关上门，然后按下开关。
